description: This file defines Express.js routes for authentication-related endpoints including user registration, login, profile retrieval, and logout. It includes Swagger documentation annotations for API documentation, and imports middleware and controllers for request handling.

methods.name: router.post('/register')
methods.description: Handles user registration by validating input and invoking the register method from the authController.

methods.name: router.post('/login')
methods.description: Handles user login by validating input and invoking the login method from the authController.

methods.name: router.get('/profile')
methods.description: Retrieves the current user's profile, protected by authentication middleware.

methods.name: router.post('/logout')
methods.description: Logs out the user, requiring authentication.
